## Spatial Analysis in R

* [**Intro to Spatial R**](https://cran.r-project.org/doc/contrib/intro-spatial-rl.pdf)
* [**Spatial.ly blog**](http://spatial.ly/)
* [**`rgdal` based tutorial** by Jeff Hollister](http://jwhollister.com/iale_open_science/2015/07/05/03-Spatial-Data-In-R/)
* [**Making GeoJSON from shapefiles**](https://blog.exploratory.io/creating-geojson-out-of-shapefile-in-r-40bc0005857d)

## Data Visualization

* [Kieran Healy's **Data Visualization for Social Science**](http://socviz.co/)
* [**Graph Do's and Dont's**](http://stat545.com/block015_graph-dos-donts.html)
* [**Shiny Interactive R Graph Catalog**](http://shiny.stat.ubc.ca/r-graph-catalog/)
* [**How to Display Data Badly (recent version)** by Karl Broman](https://www.biostat.wisc.edu/~kbroman/presentations/graphs2017.pdf)
* [**How to Display Data Badly (old version)** by Karl Broman](https://www.biostat.wisc.edu/~kbroman/presentations/IowaState2013/graphs_combined.pdf)


## General R/Data Science Resources

* [Garrett Grolemund and Hadley Wickham's **R For Data Science**](http://r4ds.had.co.nz/)
* [Jenny Bryan's **Stat545.com**](http://stat545.com/)
* [**RStudio Webinars**, many topics](https://www.rstudio.com/resources/webinars/)
* [Data Carpentry: **R for Data Analysis and Visualization of Ecological Data**](http://www.datacarpentry.org/R-ecology-lesson/)
* [Chester Ismay and Albert Y. Kim's **Modern DiveR**](https://ismayc.github.io/moderndiver-book/)
* [Julia Silge and David Robinson **Text Mining with R**](http://tidytextmining.com/)
* [Hadley Wickham's **Advanced R**](http://adv-r.had.co.nz/)
